translations: 不稳定；动摇；不规则；古怪

sentences.sentence: Two measuring methods of period-counting and timing break forward in order to practically solve the unsteadiness of the site signal.
sentences.translation: 在实际应用中提出了解决现场信号不稳定的两种测量方法，即周期计数和定时截取的测量方法。

sentences.sentence: Electronic implants in the inner ear may one day restore clear vision and equilibrium in some patients who experience disabling unsteadiness.
sentences.translation: 有朝一日，部分丧失平衡感的患者将可以通过在内耳的电子植入物重获正常的视觉和平衡感。

sentences.sentence: The result of blasting simulation clearly shows the movement of the silo is due to the unsteadiness jointing rock mass under applied blasting vibration load.
sentences.translation: 计算结果较好地反映了竖井周围岩体不稳定关键块在爆破振动作用下沿断层破坏、崩落的动力学过程。
